opinion.panel: Before BELL, C. J., JONES, EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and BARBIERI, JJ.
opinion.posture:
Appeal, No. 24, Jan. T., 1971, from decree of Court of Common Pleas of the 44th Judicial District, Wyoming County Branch, Orphans' Court Docket No. 11, page 181, in the matter of the estate of Fred G. Hitchcock,Page 622 deceased. Decree affirmed; reargument refused April 19, 1971.
Audit of accounts of executor and of administratrix d.b.n.c.t.a. Before TREMBATH, P. J.
Exceptions to accounts and proposed schedules of distribution filed; preliminary objections thereto by executor and administratrix d.b.n.c.t.a. sustained, and exceptions dismissed. Exceptant appealed.
opinion.attorneys:
Daniel H. Jenkins, for appellant.
John R. Morgan, with him Hobbs, Morgan DeWitt, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text: Decree affirmed. Estate to pay costs.
